Kerbal P-38 Stock

![2nlxrbl.png](http://i47.tinypic.com/2nlxrbl.png)

Very stable aircraft, make sure to climb to thicker air before trying some aerobatics.

Original WWII P-38 Fighter

> ![hilgert_p-38_01.jpg](http://www.cybermodeler.com/aircraft/p-38/images/hilgert_p-38_01.jpg)

Some design sacrifices were necessary to make the thing flyable (and build-able, for that matter).

 - Due to the insane amount of lift in the forward section, the outboard wings had to be shortened and their overall look simplified as compared to the original.

 - Separated tail section due to construction constraints (wing boards clip inside the fuselages if turned 90 degrees; struts help strengthen the aft section anyway)

Enjoy!

Nice! I chose to make an 'Evolved into a jet version' variant using modern jet plane style wing positioning ([Here\'s the thread](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=12745.0)). I was also pleasantly surprised by how good the handling was on mine - must be something about all that wing surface in both cases.

Did you consider using the 'swept wing' part instead of the wing connector + delta on the outboard front? They\'d have a lift rating of 1.6 on each side on the outboard part instead of the current 2.9, which should help with the excess front lift. I understand that it\'s not quite as good a match for the look, though.
Can you try replacing the jets with Damned propellers?
